title: Bracelet, ca. 1880
dimensions: H: 3 cm x L: 21.8 cm x D: 0.9 cm
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Susan Dwight Bliss, Annie Schermerhorn Kane, and various donors
description: Heavy gold bracelet with six cruciform motifs and forty-two cabochon emeralds. "Medieval" style- continuation of Castellani expanding their repetoire of historical styles.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bracelet, ca. 1880.
ca. 1880. Gold, emeralds. Museum purchase through gift of Susan Dwight Bliss, Annie Schermerhorn Kane, and various donors. 1969-40-23.
